T02D2752:132b-0: @132b * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs sku gsum dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2752:132b-2: mchod rdzogs sprul pa'i sku 'chang ba //
T02D2752:132b-3: zhes bya ba 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o //
T02D2752:132b-4: lus can kun gyi sems dbus la gnas bde chen 'dod gsal dri med sku //
T02D2752:132b-5: de stobs kyis snang dpe byad brgyad cu de bzhin mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis //
T02D2752:132b-6: bcu gnyis mdzad sogs ji lta ji ltar gdul bya'i rim bzhin de lta de //
T02D2752:132b-7: ston mdzad sku gsum rtag tu lhun grub 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
T02D2752:132b-8: drang srong mchog gi pho brang mchog / po ta la yi ri bo yi //
T02D2752:132b-9: rtse nas skyob pa spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2752:132b-10: sku gsum zhes pa 'di bskyod bya //
T02D2752:132b-11: de ni zla ba'i kha dog go //
T02D2752:132b-12: zhal gsum g-yas sngo g-yon dmar //
T02D2752:132b-13: dbus dkar zhi ba'i spyan gsum //
T02D2752:132b-14: rab tu g-yo ba'i tshul yin //
T02D2752:132b-15: phyag drug dang po gnyis kyi //
T02D2752:132b-16: lte ba la gzhag mchog mdzad //
T02D2752:132b-19: g-yas kyi gsum pa mchog spyin //
T02D2752:133a-2: zhabs gnyis skyil krung brtan bcas //
T02D2752:133a-4: de yi thugs ni pad rgyas //
T02D2752:133a-5: dri med mdzes dbus hr'i: yig / kun da ltar dkar 'od 'phro //
T02D2752:133a-6: mi brjed dran pas bsgom bya //
T02D2752:133a-7: aom a'a: hr'i: tri k'a ya lo ka n'a th'a
T02D2752:133a-8: sv'a pa r'a rth'a si ddha kar h'um h'um h'um
T02D2752:133a-9: / nyi shu gcig bcas sngags 'di sngags pa yis //
T02D2752:133a-10: nam langs thog thag nyi ma 'char ka dang //
T02D2752:133a-11: zla ba tshe dang tshe brgyad nya ba'i tshe //
T02D2752:133a-12: stong nyid bde chen snying rje'i yid kyis bzlas //
T02D2752:133a-13: gang tshe mi rtog bskyed pa'i rim pa gsal gyur cing //
T02D2752:133a-14: sna tshogs phrin las sems la dbang gyur thob pa'i tshe //
T02D2752:133a-15: ci rigs rnam bzhi phrin las mthu la sbyar ba yis //
T02D2752:133a-16: 'gro ba 'di dag myur du de yi dbang du 'gyur //
T02D2752:133a-17: de las sems ni dri med spros bral mi g-yo ste /
T02D2752:133a-18: 'di ltar de ni gzung dang 'dzin pa'i g-yeng ba zad //
T02D2752:133a-19: de thob byed pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' drin las //
T02D2752:133a-20: sems ni sa bon hr'i: yig la gnas brtan pas 'grub //
T02D2752:133a-21: gang zhig nges pas skad cig de la phyogs bcu yi //
T02D2752:133a-22: rgyal dang de sras nyan thos la sogs 'khor mang po //
T02D2752:133a-23: snang dang mi snang bde chen phun tshogs ston pa'i sku //
T02D2752:133a-24: dngos gsum dri med dag pa'i sku gsung thugs 'grub 'gyur //
T02D2752:133a-25: rtogs pas mi zad stong nyid snying rje zung 'jug gang //
T02D2752:133a-26: mthong ba'i mthu las de nyid ma rtogs sems can la //
T02D2752:133a-27: ji ltar gang 'dul de lta de la de ston pa'i //
T02D2752:133a-28: mdzad pa dpag med 'od zer phung po las sprul bya //
T02D2752:133a-29: ji ltar sku gsum mdzad dang 'di dag nyid kyi las //
T02D2752:133a-30: thub pa rnams kyis bstan pa 'dzin pa'i sngags pa de nyid yin //
T02D2752:133a-31: de las nyin re 'ang bsod nams phung po mtha' yas 'gyur //
T02D2752:133a-32: zla brgyad dam gsum mam gcig na rtags mthong blo mchog 'gyur //
T02D2752:133a-33: tshangs dang brgya byin 'khor los sgyur sogs mgos gtugs phyag 'tshal dang //
T02D2752:133a-34: smin mtshams nas 'thon nyi zla skar tshogs rnam par 'phro ba dang //
T02D2752:133a-35: seng ge glang chen sha ra na gzhon phyogs bcur rgyug pa nyid //
T02D2752:133a-36: 'od kyis lus thob bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun srin lag rtse nas 'bab pa'o //
T02D2752:133b-0: yang na rkang gnyis lha dang klu dbang gis bteg mkha' la @133b 'gro //
T02D2752:133b-1: po ta la dang dga' ldan bde ldan gnas sogs phyin pa dang //
T02D2752:133b-2: rin chen gzhal med sgo stong bye ba nas zhugs te stong gnas //
T02D2752:133b-3: mgon po nyid phyag glang chen sna ltas bdag gi spyi bor reg pa'o //
T02D2752:133b-4: 'di dag mthong nas blo ldan snyems med the tshom med pa dang //
T02D2752:133b-5: brtson 'grus lhag bskyed slar yang ji skad bshad pa'i rnal 'byor la //
T02D2752:133b-6: sbyor ba lhag mos nyin re lan gsum sgom par byed na ni //
T02D2752:133b-7: mi de myur ru spyan ras gzigs kyi blo gros dam pa thob par 'gyur //
